name: Masquerada 3D Environment
description:
A little 3D Environment based on the videogame Masquerada: Songs and Shadows. This is nothing more than a 3D environment which you can walk around in and explore, don't expect any gameplay whatsoever.

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to look around, ESC to exit

Music: Cicero's Theme by Josh Whelchel, from the Masquerada: Songs and Shadows OST
